title: Fettuccine Alfredo
ingredients: 1 lb homemade tagliatelle or purchased fresh fettuccine
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
In a large sauce pan over high heat, bring cream & butter to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for one minute.
Add six tbsp of grated pamesan and whisk over low heat until smooth, about one minute.
Remove from heat and season with salt and pepper and a generous pinch of nutmeg.
Generously salt the boiling water. Add pasta and cook.
Put the pasta in a warm shallow bowl. Pour on the sauce and sprinkle with six more tbsp of cheese. Toss well.
